price: Comei e apascentai vossos rebanhos. Por certo, há nisso sinais para os dotados de entendimento.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
